levers.name: Prompt Length
levers.description: Checks for sufficient detail in the prompt

feedback.missing: Your prompt is too short. Add more context and details.
feedback.weak: Your prompt could use more detail to get better results.
feedback.good: Good prompt length with adequate detail.

levers.name: Context Inclusion
levers.description: Detects background information and context markers

feedback.missing: Add context about your situation or project to get more relevant responses.
feedback.weak: Consider adding more background information for better results.

levers.name: Persona Specification
levers.description: Checks for role or persona assignment

feedback.missing: Consider assigning a persona or role (e.g., 'Act as a senior developer...').
feedback.weak: Your persona could be more specific to the task.

levers.name: Task Clarity
levers.description: Evaluates clear task definition and action words

feedback.missing: Clearly state what you want the AI to do (e.g., 'Write...', 'Explain...', 'Create...').
feedback.weak: Be more specific about the task you want completed.

levers.name: Examples Presence
levers.description: Detects example patterns for better understanding

feedback.missing: Adding examples can significantly improve response quality.
feedback.weak: Consider adding more examples to clarify your expectations.

feedback.missing: Specify your desired output format (e.g., list, JSON, markdown).
feedback.weak: Be more specific about the format you want.

levers.name: Constraints Defined
levers.description: Detects limits and boundaries in the prompt

feedback.missing: Define constraints or boundaries for more focused results.
